content.raw:
I don't know why this is not catched by CI jobs, but compiling SDFormat on this branch on Visual Studio 2017 in Debug (all non-osrf dependenices compiled with vcpkg) I also get these two errors:
~~~
  C:\src\gazebo-superbuild\osrf\SDFormat\src\ign_TEST.cc(34): error C3861: 'popen': identifier not found [C:\src\gazebo-superbuild\build\osrf\SDFormat\src\UNIT_ign_TEST.vcxproj]
  C:\src\gazebo-superbuild\osrf\SDFormat\src\ign_TEST.cc(48): error C3861: 'pclose': identifier not found [C:\src\gazebo-superbuild\build\osrf\SDFormat\src\UNIT_ign_TEST.vcxproj]
~~~
